text:
Travelio | Munich, Germany | Onsite (relocation available) | Software Engineer (React/Python)

We are a munich-based premium travel club for bespoke individual travel experiences. Our mission is to innovate premium tourism by creating a truly omni-channel experience. Join a highly experienced team to actively shape the rapid growth of our well-funded company.

We run a huge isomorphic React.js application (the website, https://travel.io is only the tip of the iceberg [10%]) written in ES6. Our well tested backend API is based on Django/Python. Every (merge) commit is a deploy, we do 100% code reviews.

More info: https://www.travel.io/public/styles/images/jobs/TravelioDeve... E-Mail: sebastian@travel.io

Please include your Github account and a brief CV in your application.
